item.title: Apache / PHP 5.x Remote Code Execution Exploit
item.description: /* Apache Magica by Kingcope */ /* gcc apache-magika.c -o apache-magika -lssl */ /* This is a code execution bug in the combination of Apache and PHP. On Debian and Ubuntu the vulnerability is present in the default install of the php5-cgi package.
